channel.title: Help with symbols in names please?

item.title: Help with symbols in names please?
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

ok i want to stop people from logging into my server with all that ~~~~@!#(^%#@ stuff in their names, but i cant find any tuts on it and the thing i have now doesnt work for soem reasonâ€¦ anyone help please? Thanks alot

here is the one i have right now public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2008, 03:18:52 pm[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2008, 03:24:02 pm[/size][hr]any1?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with symbols in names please?
